item.title: 拜登为经济记录辩护，称特朗普计划威胁经济增长
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登警告说，共和党人唐纳德-特朗普延长减税和通过关税重塑全球贸易的计划有可能使经济成果发生逆转，而他对自己处理经济的不满也是上个月选举失利的原因之一。【原文：President Joe Biden warned that Republican Donald Trump’s plans to extend tax cuts and reshape global trade through tariffs risked reversing economic gains, even as dissatisfaction with his own handling of the economy contributed to last month’s stinging electoral loss.】

item.title: 拉扎德首席执行官认为 2025 年是资产管理的 "拐点
item.description: 拉扎德公司（Lazard Inc.首席执行官彼得-奥尔萨格（Peter Orszag）表示，明年将是该公司资产管理业务的 "拐点"，此前该公司公布的客户持股量每月都有小幅下降。【原文：Lazard Inc. Chief Executive Officer Peter Orszag said next year will be an “inflection point” for the asset management side of the firm’s business, after it posted a small monthly drop in client holdings.】

item.title: 亿万富翁内幕交易员乔-刘易斯的飞行员免于牢狱之灾
item.description: 亿万富翁商人乔-刘易斯（Joe Lewis）的一名私人飞行员因逃税而避免了牢狱之灾，他的逃税与他老板的内幕交易案有关。【原文：A private pilot for billionaire businessman Joe Lewis avoided prison for tax evasion tied to the insider trading case against his boss.】

item.title: 中国网络安全公司遭美国制裁，员工被起诉
item.description: 美国制裁了一家被指控为情报机构工作的中国公司，并指控该公司一名员工入侵全球数千家企业的计算机系统，其中包括美国关键基础设施公司。【原文：The US sanctioned a Chinese company it accused of working for intelligence agencies and charged one of its employees with hacking into the computer systems of thousands of businesses across the globe, including American critical infrastructure firms.】

item.title: McWin Capital 正在洽谈收购英国连锁面包店 Gail's
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由交易商 Henry McGovern 和 Steven Winegar 掌舵的食品投资公司 McWin Capital Partners 正在洽谈收购英国连锁面包店 Gail's。【原文：McWin Capital Partners, the food investment firm helmed by dealmakers Henry McGovern and Steven Winegar, is in talks to buy UK bakery chain Gail’s, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Flat Footed 要求 Grifols 改革董事会以保护股东利益
item.description: Grifols 的非家族股东之一 Flat Footed 与对冲基金 Mason Capital Management LLC 一起呼吁对这家西班牙制药商的董事会进行彻底改革。【原文：Flat Footed, one of Grifols’ non-family shareholders, joined hedge fund Mason Capital Management LLC in calling for an overhaul of the Spanish drugmaker’s board.】

item.title: 美国发放由俄罗斯资产支持的 200 亿美元乌克兰贷款
item.description: 美国财政部周二表示，已发放 200 亿美元贷款支持乌克兰，这笔贷款将用俄罗斯央行资产被冻结后产生的利润偿还。【原文：The US Treasury Department said Tuesday it disbursed a $20 billion loan to support Ukraine, which will be repaid using the profits generated from immobilized Russian central bank assets.】

item.title: Engaged Capital 称 Voyix 和 Atleos 在 NCR 解散后价值被低估
item.description: Engaged Capital 在周二举行的彭博激进主义论坛 2024 上表示，该激进投资者认为，从 NCR 公司分离出来的 NCR Atleos Corp.【原文：Engaged Capital believes NCR Atleos Corp. and NCR Voyix Corp., which were broken out of NCR Corp., could attract buyout interest from financial or strategic buyers, the activist investor said during the Bloomberg Activism Forum 2024 on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国认为 2025 年全球石油将出现小幅赤字，前景发生逆转
item.description: 美国改变了对明年原油供应过剩的预测，现在呼吁石油市场出现小幅赤字。【原文：The US reversed its forecast for a crude glut next year and is now calling for a small oil-market deficit.】

item.title: 加拿大立法者将矛头指向不透明的银行控股支付公司 Interac
item.description: 加拿大立法者将矛头对准了该国广泛使用的汇款服务--由 Interac 公司运营的汇款服务，并暗示其所有者应被迫出售该服务。【原文：Canadian lawmakers took aim at the country’s widely used money-transfer service, run by Interac Corp., and hinted that its owners should be forced to sell it.】

item.title: 众议院议长迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）发出推迟对《儿童在线安全法案》采取行动的信号
item.description: 众议院议长迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）周二表示，尽管支持者与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 社交媒体平台谈判达成了协议，但本届国会不太可能就保护儿童免受网络剥削和欺凌的立法采取行动。【原文：House Speaker Mike Johnson signaled on Tuesday that the current Congress is unlikely to act on legislation to protect children from online exploitation and bullying despite a deal supporters negotiated with Elon Musk’s X social media platform.】

item.title: 迈克尔-赛勒要求微软购买比特币的建议落空
item.description: 即使微策略公司的迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）发出个人呼吁，也未能说服软件巨头微软公司跟随他的脚步投资比特币。【原文：Even a personal appeal by MicroStrategy Inc.’s Michael Saylor failed to persuade software giant Microsoft Corp. to follow in his footsteps by investing in Bitcoin.】

item.title: 马克龙力争避免在 2027 年前举行新一届法国议会选举
item.description: 一位接近总统的官员在与各政党就组建新政府举行会谈后表示，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙的目标是避免在任期结束前举行新的立法选举。【原文：France’s Emmanuel Macron aims to avoid calling fresh legislative elections before the end of his term, an official close the president said after talks with political parties on forming a new government.】

item.title: 博雅银行任命比荷卢地区投资银行业务联席主管
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）任命了比荷卢地区企业和投资银行业务的新领导，以拓展当地客户网络。【原文：Bank of America Corp. has named new leaders for its corporate and investment banking for the Benelux region in a bid to expand its local client network.】

item.title: 雄狮电动车总裁离职，电动车制造商寻找资金来源
item.description: 加拿大电动巴士和卡车制造商雄狮电动汽车公司总裁辞职，因为这家资金匮乏的公司正在为维持生存做最后的努力。【原文：The president of Canadian electric bus and truck manufacturer Lion Electric Co. resigned as the cash-poor company made a last-ditch attempt to stay afloat.】

item.title: 英国探讨加入欧盟 15 亿欧元基金以促进国防部门发展
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，英国正在考虑参与欧盟为支持地区国防工业而设立的 15 亿欧元（16 亿美元）基金。【原文：The UK is considering participating in a €1.5 billion ($1.6 billion) fund being set up by the European Union to bolster the regional defense industry, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 天狼星电信（SiriusXM）2025 年收入前景黯淡，公司计划削减成本
item.description: 霍华德-斯特恩（Howard Stern）所在的在线广播服务公司天狼星 XM 控股公司（Sirius XM Holdings Inc.【原文：Shares of Sirius XM Holdings Inc., the online radio service that’s home to shock jock Howard Stern, fell as much as 9.8% after the company issued a 2025 revenue forecast that fell short of Wall Street estimates and said it will undertake a new cost-cutting drive.】

item.title: 芝加哥财政委员会推进 6,900 万美元的物业税增税计划
item.description: 芝加哥推进了市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）缩减房产税增幅的计划，使该市更接近于填补近 10 亿美元的赤字，并按时通过 2025 年预算。【原文：Chicago advanced Mayor Brandon Johnson’s scaled-down property-tax increase, moving the city closer to filling its nearly $1 billion deficit and passing its 2025 budget on time.】

item.title: 华尔街顾问称特朗普时代交易量将回升
item.description: 据华尔街顾问称，随着监管的放松，来年的并购和股票市场首次亮相都将受到影响，各家公司都在拾起他们的交易手册。【原文：Companies are dusting off their dealmaking playbooks as an expected loosening of regulation lifts both acquisitions and stock market debuts in the coming year, according to Wall Street advisers.】

item.title: PF Chang's 建议延长债务期限，以改善 "垃圾 "评级
item.description: 连锁餐饮企业 PF Chang's China Bistro Inc. 希望通过延长 2026 年到期的贷款期限来缓解短期债务压力，此举有助于提高其信用评级。【原文：Restaurant chain PF Chang’s China Bistro Inc. wants to ease short-term debt pressures by extending the maturity of a loan due in 2026, a move that could help improve its credit rating.】

item.title: 印度新任央行行长警告不要扼杀 "金鹅
item.description: 印度新任央行行长是一位注重细节的官僚，以工作时间长著称。当他希望扭转印度经济增长放缓的趋势并控制物价上涨时，这种纪律性将派上用场。【原文：India’s new central bank head is a detail-oriented bureaucrat known for working long hours. That discipline will come in handy as he looks to reverse India’s growth slowdown and keep price rises in check.】

item.title: ServiceTitan 分析师认为利润率影响上市后估值
item.description: 彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）分析师认为，随着 ServiceTitan 公司首次公开募股的临近，该公司的利润率将成为缩小与同行估值差距的关键。【原文：ServiceTitan Inc.’s profit margins will be key to closing a valuation gap relative to peers, according to Bloomberg Intelligence analysts, as the company’s initial public offering approaches.】

item.title: Alphabet 在 Willow 量子芯片取得突破后一路攀升
item.description: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 公司周一宣布利用其 Willow 量子芯片在量子计算领域取得重大进展，分析师对此大加赞赏，Alphabet 公司股价创下 10 月份以来最大涨幅。【原文：Alphabet Inc. shares jumped the most since October as analysts applauded the Google parent’s announcement Monday of a major development in quantum computing through the use of its Willow quantum chip.】
